mapper.insert: INSERT INTO follow(num, follower_id, following_id) VALUES (follow_seq.NEXTVAL, #{sessionId}, #{userId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM follow WHERE follower_id = #{sessionId} AND following_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow WHERE follower_id = #{sessionId} AND following_id = #{userId}

SELECT m.userId, nickName, memberImageName, NVL(recipeCount, 0) recipeCount, NVL(followerCount ,0) followerCount, NVL(followingCount, 0) followingCount, NVL(userFollowed, 0) userFollowed FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT i.userId, memberImageName FROM memberImage i ) i ON m.userid = i.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT r.userId, COUNT(*) recipeCount FROM recipe r GROUP BY r.userId ) r ON m.userId = r.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT f.following_Id, COUNT(*) followerCount FROM follow f GROUP BY f.following_Id ) f ON m.userId = f.following_Id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT f.follower_Id, COUNT(*) followingCount FROM follow f GROUP BY f.follower_Id ) f ON m.userId = f.follower_Id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT f.following_Id, COUNT(*) userFollowed FROM follow f WHERE f.follower_Id = #{sessionId} GROUP BY f.following_Id ) f ON m.userId = f.following_Id WHERE m.userId = #{userId}

SELECT follower_id followId, nickName followNickName, memberImageName followImageName FROM follow f LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT userId, nickName FROM member m ) m ON f.follower_id = m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT i.userId, memberImageName FROM memberImage i ) i ON f.follower_id = i.userId WHERE following_id = #{userId}

SELECT following_id followId, nickName followNickName, memberImageName followImageName FROM follow f LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT userId, nickName FROM member m ) m ON f.following_id = m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT i.userId, memberImageName FROM memberImage i ) i ON f.following_id = i.userId WHERE follower_id = #{userId}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM recipe r LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT p.recipeNum, recipePhotoName FROM recipePhoto p ) p ON r.recipeNum = p.recipeNum WHERE userId = #{userId}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM recipeLike l LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT r.recipenum, recipeSubject FROM recipe r ) r ON l.recipenum = r.recipenum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT p.recipeNum, recipePhotoName FROM recipePhoto p ) p ON r.recipeNum = p.recipeNum WHERE userId = #{userId}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM classLike l LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT c.classCode, classSubject FROM classTable c ) c ON l.classCode = c.classCode LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT f.classCode, classPhotoName FROM classFile f ) f ON c.classCode = f.classCode WHERE userId = #{userId}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM festivalLike l LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT f.festivalNum, festivalName FROM festival f ) f ON l.festivalNum = f.festivalNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ROWNUM, p.festivalNum, festivalPhotoName FROM festivalPhoto p WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY festivalPhotoNum ASC ) p ON f.festivalNum = p.festivalNum WHERE userId = #{userId}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) usableCount FROM ( SELECT u.eventNum, userId, orderCode, couponName, discountPrice, createTime, expireTime FROM userCoupon u LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT c.eventNum, couponName, discountPrice, createTime, expireTime FROM coupon c ) c ON u.eventNum = c.eventNum WHERE userId = #{userId} AND orderCode IS NULL AND expireTime > SYSDATE )

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) uselessCount FROM ( SELECT u.eventNum, userId, orderCode, couponName, discountPrice, createTime, expireTime FROM userCoupon u LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT c.eventNum, couponName, discountPrice, createTime, expireTime FROM coupon c ) c ON u.eventNum = c.eventNum WHERE userId = #{userId} AND (orderCode IS NOT NULL OR expireTime < SYSDATE) )

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) qnaCount FROM ( SELECT num, q.categoryNum, categoryName, subject, userId, reg_date, parent FROM qna q LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT c.categoryNum, category categoryName FROM qnaCategory c ) c ON q.categoryNum = c.categoryNum WHERE userId = #{userId} AND parent IS NULL )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(reviewNum, reviewContent, reviewStar, classCode, orderCode) VALUES (review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewStar}, #{classCode}, #{orderCode})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) refundCount FROM ( SELECT cc.orderCode, TO_CHAR(cancelReg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') cancelRegDate, userId, d.classCode, c.classSubject, f.classPhotoName FROM canceling cc LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT o.orderCode, userId FROM ordering o ) o ON cc.orderCode = o.orderCode LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT d.orderCode, d.classCode FROM orderDetail d ) d ON cc.orderCode = d.orderCode LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT c.classCode, classSubject FROM classTable c ) c ON d.classCode = c.classCode LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT f.classCode, classPhotoName FROM classFile f ) f ON d.classCode = f.classCode WHERE userId = #{userId} )
